Uses of Class
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.euclidean.Straight

Packages that use Straight
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.euclidean Provides support for calculations within 2-dimensional Euclidean space. 
 

Uses of Straight in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.euclidean
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.euclidean that return Straight
 Straight Straight.clone()
           
 Straight Straight.getCopy()
          Returns a copy of this Straight object.
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.euclidean with parameters of type Straight
 Angle Straight.getAngle(Straight other)
          Returns the (smallest) angle between this Straight and the provided one.
 Angle Straight.getAngleCCW(Straight other)
          Returns the counter-clock-wise (CCW) or positive Angle spanned between the two Straights.
 Angle Straight.getAngleCW(Straight other)
          Returns the clock-wise (CW) or negative angle spanned between the two Straights.
 Vector Straight.getIntersection(Straight other)
          Computes the intersection point of this Straight and the provided one, if it exists.
 boolean Straight.intersects(Straight other)
          Checks whether this Straight and the provided one have a single point of intersection.
 boolean Straight.intersectsWithinSegment(Vector segmentStart, Vector segmentEnd, Straight other)
          Checks whether this Straight and the provided one have an intersection point, which is inside the specified segment between segmentStart and segmentEnd.
 boolean Straight.isParallelTo(Straight other)
          Checks whether this Straight and the provided one are parallel to each other.
